title: Why should one choose humanities stream after class 10? - Quora

response.answer_text: Firstly, I will write when one should not choose humanities. One should not choose humanities — If he/she loves Science or Commerce.If he/she really wants to be someone (doctor or engineer) for which Science is needed or someone (ones in business) for which Commerce is needed.If he/she does not like studying subjects like History and Sociology which are vast and bulky in material.If he/she loves Science but gets a little low score in Mathematics, because at the end of the day, passion matters in my opinion. In that case, one can go for Science but has to work a little harder to keep up a good score in us two level.If everyone else except him or her thinks that humanities suits him or her. Now, in the second part, I would love to expound the points when one should choose humanities — If he/she loves Humanities.If he/she is good at Science but loves Humanities subjects more.If he/she doesn't like Science or is sure that it will be difficult to study Science in the plus two level.If he/she wants to be a teacher of an arts subject, lawyer, psychologist, etc. [It is not mandatory to take Humanities to be a lawyer but it is easier if a person chooses Humanities because the subjects are related with one another in a beautiful way.]If he/she feels that Humanities suits him or her.These points are completely based on my personal experience as a student and as a person who has seen a number of students choosing streams because they are being forced to do so. These have helped me a great deal while deciding my stream.  An answer to the query — Why should one choose humanities stream after class 10? Good luck!
